short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to add YouTube and Vimeo videos to the Recall web app!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes it easier to add Vimeo and YouTube videos to the Recall Web App. You need to have an instance of Recall Open for the extension to work! Go to Vimeo or YouTube video, click the extension and select one of the three adding options. 
Add to Current Directory will add the video to the last accessed or currently open directory. If you did not open any directories since opening the app, nothing will happen. 
Add to root directory will add the video to the root directory no matter what. You can easily relocate the video later. 
Choose directory later will let you import the video from the Import Videos tab.
